dct:title: Miami-Dade Average Land Surface Temperature 2013-2022
dct:creator: Nkosi Muse;
dct:description: This data collection is comprised of statistical summary as an average from LST scenes (processed in ArcGIS) that were captured at 11 AM EDT/12 PM EST by the Landsat 8 satellite (2013-2022). Scenes are Level 2-1, retrieved from the USGS Earth Explorer. Processed LST rasters in TIFF format are composed of 30x30m pixels that contain a LST value in Celsius (°C) for that area. Each raster image is clipped to Miami-Dade County boundaries (downloaded from the Miami-Dade County Open Data Hub).
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m/{download,mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m/etl} && cd /data/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# download if update flag is set:
if do_update == 1 then
  wget -O download/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m.zip 'https://scholarship.miami.edu/view/fileRedirect?instCode=01UOML_INST&filePid=13440658420002976&download=true'

# unzip to download directory if update flag is set
if do_update == 1 then
  unzip -d download download/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m.zip && rm download/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m.zip

# load raster into postGIS with:
    raster2pgsql -s 32617 -d -C -I LST_Avg_Scenes/AvgMDC_LST_2013_2022.tif -F -t 256x256 mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m > load_raster.sql
psql <connection options> < load_raster.sql
rm load_raster.sql

# render raster tiles 
mkdir -p /tiles/raster/mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m
cd /data/mdc_2013_2022_lst_30m/mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m/
cat > mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m_color_ramp.txt <<_EOF
0 0 0 0 0
20.0 171 168 125 255
20.5 194 171 117 255
21.0 193 157 97 255
21.5 195 138 83 255
22.0 190 112 76 255
22.5 175 77 77 255
23.5 158 41 76 255
24.0 135 32 62 255
24.5 110 21 49 255
25.0 86 12 37 255
27.0 61 2 22 255
_EOF
gdaldem color-relief download/LST_Avg_Scenes/AvgMDC_LST_2013_2022.tif mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m_color_ramp.txt download/LST_Avg_Scenes/AvgMDC_LST_2013_2022_color.tif -alpha
gdal2tiles.py -ex --xyz -z 8-16 download/LST_Avg_Scenes/AvgMDC_LST_2013_2022_color.tif /tiles/raster/mdc_2013_2022_avg_lst_30m/
dcat:contactPoint: University of Miami Libraries, Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing
